# Planning Documents

This directory contains internal planning documents for Tario development.

## Structure

```
planning/
├── README.md              # This file
├── ROADMAP.md             # Feature roadmap and priorities
├── backlog-summary.md     # Issue backlog overview
└── [feature]-plan.md      # Individual feature plans
```

## Purpose

These documents are for project maintainers and contributors to track:
- Long-term vision and priorities
- Feature planning and design decisions
- Sprint planning and issue organization
- Technical debt and refactoring plans

## User-Facing Documentation

For user-facing documentation, see:
- [README.md](../../README.md) - Project overview
- [docs/](../../docs/) - Guides and tutorials
- [CONTRIBUTING.md](../../CONTRIBUTING.md) - Contribution guidelines

## Adding Planning Documents

When creating new planning documents:
1. Use descriptive filenames: `[feature]-plan.md`, `[topic]-notes.md`
2. Include date in documents that may become stale
3. Link to related GitHub issues
4. Update this README if adding new document types
